title: Trying to fix something by posting onto the boards
body: I'm just trying out a fix for an issue I was having where people recommended posting something to the boards first.

replies.body: Was your account level not showing up properly?  A post should get that updated, so I'm assuming everything is fine now.  :D
It's working now. I guess that's what happened. I'm not quite sure. But again, yes, it is working!
